Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: I think only handlers should be allowed to push changes to X

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: I don't know why we need to pass a copy, but it seems to be done everywhere.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: In case the command contains “reload”, the binding may not exist anymore after the reload completed. We’ve had actual user bug reports about this, so it’s not a theoretical thing. I’ll add a comment stating that to the code.
